full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDE MCHOG LHA LNGA'I SGRUB THABS SNYING PO BSDUS PA BDE CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA NI,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @058A *, ,(CES DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG LHA LNGA'I SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI NI, LAM 'DI LA LHAG PAR MOS PAS THUGS DAM BYED 'DOD KYANG, RGYAS PA MA LCOGS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, [...]? SHING DON GYI GNAD TSANG BA MED PA SNYING POR DRIL TE, MDO RGYUD MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, 'BROG RI BO CHE DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL RIN CHEN TSE RING CHOS 'PHEL LO,, ,,)
